elements.label: Title
elements.helpText: This text displays above the form.

elements.label: Action URL
elements.helpText: This is the POST action URL found on the WCA form HTML.

elements.label: Submit button label
elements.helpText: This text shows on the button which submits the form.

elements.label: Terms
elements.helpText: This text shows above the submit form button, and can be used to show terms, instructions, or any additional information to the user.

elements.label: Success message
elements.helpText: This message will be shown to the user upon successful submission of the form.

elements.label: Error message
elements.helpText: This message will be shown to the user if there is an error submitting the form.

elements.label: Form elements
elements.helpText: A WCA form element, to display as part of this form. Add multiple elements to build the complete form.
